price: (4) Indeed, those who call you, [O Muḥammad], from behind the chambers - most of them do not use reason.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُنَادُونَكَ مِن وَرَآءِ ٱلۡحُجُرَٰتِ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yunādūnaka min warāi al-ḥujurāti aktharuhum lā yaʿqilūna
